review: It's pretty cool, set up was literally 20 seconds.
author: Daniel K

review: plenty to choose from something for everyone. installation a breeze. works well.
author: K S KECK

review: Love, love, love it!!!! A great product.  Easy to install and ready to in 5 minutes.
author: Terri L Bunn

review: The best quality and most versatile streaming device I've tried. Gave away the others after seeing the ease of control and data entry with this.  Usually seems to deliver better quality video than the other little boxes (Chromecast, Vizio, Roku).
author: Greg Anderson

review: Love it. So easy to use.
author: janice treckey

review: Bought them for the Prime price so it was a great deal.  Issues here and there but for $19 totally worth it.  Slightly edges out a Chromecast at least the way I use them.
author: Josh

review: I love it for the price you honestly can't beat it. The iOS app works great it has a ton of apps and runs everything smooth.
author: Clayton Curtis Rood
